did.unittitle: Catherine Ruby Force's Indiana University scrapbook
did.abstract: Catherine Ruby Force was an undergraduate student at Indiana University (A.B. Botany, 1919) from 1915-1919, during which time she was a member of Delta Gamma sorority and the Botany Club. This scrapbook documents her time at Indiana University and includes photos of Force's friends and family, as well as booklets, pamphlets, cards, and other memorabilia from sorority events and gatherings.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Advance notice required.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Catherine Ruby Force was originally from Loogootee, Indiana. Her parents were Seth and Mollie Force. She graduated from Indiana University in 1919 with an A.B. in Botany. During her time at IU, she served as the president of the Botany Club and became a member of the Delta Gamma sorority in 1918. After graduation, she married Lloyd Lang. Force died in 1973 in Washington, Indiana.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one scrapbook with contents dating from 1915-1920. The scrapbook documents Catherine Ruby Force's time at Indiana University and includes photos of her friends and family, as well as booklets, pamphlets, cards, and other memorabilia from sorority events and gatherings.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Related photographs may be available in the University Archives Photographs Database.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: The donor(s) of this collection have not transferred their copyrights for the materials to the Trustees of Indiana University. For more information, please contact the Indiana University Archives staff.

The Indiana University Archives respects the intellectual property rights of others and does not claim any copyrights for non-university records, materials in the public domain, or materials for which we do not hold a Deed of Gift. Responsibility for the determination of the copyright status of these materials rests with those persons wishing to reuse the materials. Researchers are responsible for securing permission from copyright owners and any other rights holders for any reuse of these materials that extends beyond fair use or other statutory limitations.

Digital reproductions of archival materials from the Indiana University Archives are made available for noncommercial educational and research purposes only. If you are the copyright holder for any of the digitized materials and have questions about its inclusion on our site, please contact the Indiana University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Catherine Ruby Force's Indiana University scrapbook, Collection C659, Indiana University Archives, Bloomington.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Donor Jim Craig purchased this scrapbook at an estate sale circa 1986. He donated it to the University Archives in November 2016.
